subject: How to test exceptions in java with junit
msgSnippet: Hello, I m not very familiar with junit unit testing, but I would like to ask about how to test exceptions with junit.It means If I have a method which throws
messageBody:
Hello,
I'm not very familiar with junit unit testing, but I would like to ask about how
to test exceptions with junit.It means If I have a method which throws or (catch and try ) exceptions how could I test that.
So I would like to know more how to test exceptions and error cases in a java code.
If possible, could anyone give me examples or/and documentation.
Thanks a lot .
Best regards
Riadh MNASRI
